Oct 4 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:

  • AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - OFFER TO BUYOUT AIRTEL NIGERIA MINORITIES

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - TOTAL CONSIDERATION IS ESTIMATED TO BE NGN 61.24 BN

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - SEEKS TO BUY BACK 8.27% MINORITY SHAREHOLDINGS AT AN OFFER PRICE OF NGN 55.81 PER SHARE

  • AIRTEL AFRICA - SUBSIDIARY INITIATED A PROCESS UNDER WHICH IT SEEKS TO BUY BACK 8.27% MINORITY SHAREHOLDINGS AT AN OFFER PRICE OF NGN 55.81 PER SHARE

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AAF.L
